## NullableBool enumeration

Represents triple boolean values.

```csharp
public enum NullableBool : sbyte
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| NotDefined | `-1` | Boolean value is undefined. |
| False | `0` | False value. |
| True | `1` | True value. |
